resources.string: 1. The black circle represents all Smaugs, the red circle represents all Toogs, and the green circle represents all Ficks.) Which region represents (Things that are all three: Smaugs, Ficks, and Toogs)?
2. Which one of the five is least like the other four?
3. Ralph travels four blocks north, then two blocks east, then three blocks south and finally two blocks west. How many blocks is Ralph from his starting place?
4. If you rearrange the letters \"ANICH\", you would have the name of a/an:\n(Country, Ocean, State, City, or Animal)?
